articles.content: With Osaka cut off from IRL social touchstones and without access to her day job, her TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and other platforms provided the most candid way for her to speak up as she … [+1766 chars]

articles.author: Derek Bodner
articles.title: Joel Embiid, Shake Milton lead 76ers' preseason opener - The Athletic
articles.description: The 76ers defeated the Boston Celtics 108-99 in their preseason opener behind big performances from Joel Embiid and Shake Milton.
articles.content: With a skeleton support crew in the arena and artificial crowd noise piped through the speakers, the Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Boston Celtics 108-99 on Tuesday night in their preseason opener.W… [+775 chars]
